drupalNodeEvent.title: Security and Defense Cooperation in the Indo-Pacific | 2020 Conference on Taiwan in the Indo-Pacific

field_speakers.processed: Chair (James Ellis), Discussant (Joseph Felter), Discussant (Che-chuan Lee), Panelist (Phillip Saunders), Panelist (Tetsuo Kotani), Panelist (Chyungly Lee)

field_description.processed:
Join the 2020 Conference on Taiwan in the Indo-Pacific Region.
Panel 1 will take place on Monday, October 12 from 4:00pm-5:30pm PDT and focuses on Security and Defense Cooperation in the Indo-Pacific.
CHAIR: James Ellis (Hoover Institution)
DISCUSSANT: Joseph Felter (Hoover Institution), Che-chuan Lee (INDSR)
• The changing balance of military power in the Indo-Pacific Region
Phillip Saunders, National Defense University
• Indo-Pacific strategies: The perspectives of key U.S. allies and partners
Tetsuo Kotani, Japan Institute of International Affairs
• Taiwan’s Overall Defense Concept and its global partnerships
Chyungly Lee, National Chengchi University
